item.title: 5 years at Microsoft, my lucky story!
item.description: This week, on September 1, 2019, it’s been 5 years since I was lucky enough to start working at the biggest IT company in the world – the dream company I finally joined at 25 years old. But luck doesn’t come from just the last 5 years. That luck started in 2004 – 15 years ago when I was 15 years old. I started attending Technical High School, which led to an offer to start my first internship for 2 or 3 months at the Data Processing Laboratory of Colégio Bagozzi, right after beginning my technical course.
